I just started to setup a simple mechanism for tetramethylsilane
decomposit=
ion. But I did not come too far because I am getting the
following error fr=
om Cantera (see below). The error only occurs if the
H2/NASA data are added=
, which I don't understand. Without the NASA
polynomials everything seems t=
o be o.k.

Is this a problem of mixing Shomate/NASA and const_cp in the mec=
hanism
file? Is something else wrong?

In the following I list 1)the error =
message  2) the python commands
and 3) the mechanism, which is so far only =
a definition of a gas phase
with three species...

Can anybody help?
Thanks=
!
Burak Atakan
